EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2021-11-18-HHS-TDH-Inpatient-Solution-Webinar.invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Inpatient Care Solution: scalable, cost-effective virtual care
EmailTemplate.textOnly: JOIN OUR WEBINAR: Redesigning the Inpatient Experience with Virtual Care Delivery Wednesday, December 15 1:00 PM Eastern We’ve invited Jennifer Ball, Director of Virtual Care at Saint Luke’s Health System, to talk about her experience with one of the nation’s first virtual nursing programs and how using both in-person and virtual services can provide a solid solution to today’s healthcare challenges. While Teladoc Health is synonymous with virtual care, we understand that quality inpatient care remains a priority. Join Jennifer as she sits down with Teladoc Health’s Director of Inpatient Care Solutions, Tammy Cress, to discuss the value of redesigning inpatient care delivery to integrate virtual care and the advantages it has given Saint Luke’s. About Teladoc Health Teladoc Health is empowering all people everywhere to live healthier lives by transforming the healthcare experience. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages clinical expertise, advanced technology and actionable data insights to meet the evolving needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
